title: Check on Pres and Parl Systems

content.question: Which of the following is a check on the executive in both a presidential and a parliamentary system?

choices.label: There may be imposed time deadlines on calling new elections.
The lower house of the legislature may pass an impeachment resolution.
The legislature may refuse to pass executive proposed legislation.
The Supreme Court may remove the executive from office.

content.answer: The legislature may refuse to pass executive proposed legislation.
